value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19972v1", "title": "Narrow Spectra in Heavy Quark Systems", "summary": "Opportunities to observe new hadrons with very narrow widths are discussed.\nTwo areas of focus are the lowest P-states of heavy-light mesons and doubly\nheavy baryons.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph,hep-ex", "published": "2025-04-28T16:47:20Z"}
